name: C-Wars (itch)
description:
Pixel Sci-fi Grid Action!

C-Wars is a pixel action game with strategy, rogue-like flavor, and 16-bit graphics which is retro enough to bring you back to the 90s. If you love challenges, pixel art, and occasionally play FPS, then C-Wars is worth trying out.

Free Demo!

The game is in early access on Steam and is still in development. 
You can play the prologue demo here at itch.io for free.
Further chapters are currently only available in the steam edition. 
For now, there are 3 chapters and there will be more to come in the future.
